659:3: anatikramaṇīyo'yaṃ kalparājā mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya mantratantrābhiṣekamaṇḍalavidhāna nica japahomaniyamavidyāsādhanapravṛttānāmasmiṃ kalpavare vidyādharāṇāṃ tithinakṣatracaritagaṇitāmabhijñānāṃ nakṣatra bhavadbhiḥ vighnaṃ kartavyam |
659:4: pravṛttānāṃ śāsane'smin sarvaiśca devasaṅghaiḥ tatra rakṣā kāryā |
659:10: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣābhyunnataṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma sarvaduṣṭanivāraṇārtthaṃ sarvasattvānām|
659:11: samanantarasamāpannasya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ sarve ca te tathāgatāḥ daśadiglokadhātuvyavasthitā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniḥ tathāgataṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanasyaṃ vyalokyopasaṅkramante |
659:12: upasaṅkramya acintyabuddhasvakādhiṣṭhānena bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamāmantrayate sma ||
659:13: bhāṣa bhāṣa bho mahāvīra ! lokānāṃ ca hitodayam |
659:16: ekākṣaraḥ pravaro hyagro naṣṭe kāle kalau yuge ||
659:20: vighnāḥ sarve tathā loke ye cānye duṣṭacetasā ||
659:21: anugrahārtthaṃ tu sattvānāṃ jāpināṃ ca sukhodayām |
659:26: atha teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ sannipātā sarvaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātavaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ ca lokabhājanāni ekajvālībhūtāni,
659:29: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ sarvaṃ taṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya,
659:30: tāṃśca bodhisattvānmahāsattvān tatrasthitāni ca devaputrāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāṃśca bhagavataḥ mahāparṣatsannipātānāmantrayate sma ||
659:31: samanvāharantu buddhā ! bhagavantaḥ ! sarvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāḥ kalpamekākṣarasya vidyācakravartinaḥ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣāṇāṃ uparyuparivartamānasyāpratihataśāsanasyāparimitabalaparākramasya bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣarājacakravartinaḥ punarapi kalpaṃ bhāṣe'ham asmiṃ kāle kalau yuge ||
659:32: atha bhagavato duratikramaśāsanasya trailokyaguroḥ sarvadevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragasatkṛtasya sarvakarmārthasādhakasya mantre vakṣye punarapi kalau yuge kāle śāsanāntarddhānakāle samaye śāsanārakṣako bhagavāṃ uṣṇīṣacakravartī bhaviṣyati |
659:34: sarvakālaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ ca śāsanāntarddhānakālasamaye buddho'yaṃ bhagavāṃ sattvārthaṃ kariṣyati |
659:42: yathā hi buddhānāṃ śarīrā pravṛttā dhātavo jane ||
659:50: sa viśvarūpī sarvajñaḥ dṛśyate ha mahītale ||
659:52: eṣa saṃkṣepato mantraḥ japto'yaṃ vidhinā svayam ||
659:53: karoti sarvakarmaṃ vai īpsitāṃ saphalāṃ sadā |
659:54: asya kalpaṃ samāsena punaḥ kāle pracakṣyate ||
659:55: yugānte munivare loke astaṃ yāte tathāgate |
659:57: atha bhagavataścakravartinastathāgatoṣṇīṣasya parakarmaprayogavidhvaṃsanakarasyājitaṃjayasya sarvamantrādhipateḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvānunītasyoṣṇīṣacakravartinaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ kalpamekākṣarasya pravartitapūrvaṃ vistarataḥ ||
659:59: tasmiṃ sthāne pathe yojanābhyantareṇa sarvaduṣṭagrahāḥ prapalāyanti,
659:64: svayaṃ vidyācchedaṃ karttukāmaḥ kuśānāṃ haritānāṃ muṣṭiṃ gṛhītvā,
659:100: dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ tilānāmaṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ saptāhaṃ yaṃ mantramuddiśya,
659:103: pratyādeśaṃ vā prayacchāmi devā vaśīkarttukāmaḥ devadārusamidhānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt,
659:107: yakṣāṃ vaśīkarttukāmo dadhibhaktaṃ juhuyād vaśyā bhavanti |
659:110: aśokapriyaṅgusamidbhiḥ kusumairvā yakṣiṇīnāgināgagrahāṇāṃ rājikābhiḥ rājānasiddhārthakaiḥ brahmāṇaṃ puṣpahomena,
659:116: sarvān ghṛītatailahomena vaśyāṃ karoti sarvatra trisandhyaṃ saptarātram |
659:122: eṣa kalpo mayā proktaḥ ekadeśo hi cakriṇe |
659:124: kalpairyasya pramāṇaṃ tu na śakyaṃ bhāṣituṃ jinaiḥ |
659:129: naṣṭe kāle yugānte vai mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhodayam ||
